name: Emergency Watershed Protection Program - Disaster Relief Appropriations Act
objective: The objective of the EWP Program is to assist sponsors, landowners, and operators in implementing emergency recovery measures for runoff retardation and erosion prevention to relieve imminent hazards to life and property created by a natural disaster that causes a sudden impairment of a watershed.
applicant_types: Local (includes State-designated Indian Tribes, excludes institutions of higher education and hospitals

authorizations.text: Disaster Relief Appropriations Act. 4 Stat. 127. Pub. L. 113, 2.

rules_regulations: 7 CFR Part 624; National Emergency Watershed Protection Program Manual.
